content.rendered:
There are no retroactive approvals for any type of application.

  • La Verne IRB International Research
  • La Verne IRB Limited Review
  • La Verne IRB Membership

  • La Verne IRB Nonexempt Research
  • La Verne IRB Obtaining Site Permission
  • La Verne IRB Oral History and Similar Research Policy
  • La Verne IRB Secondary Data Analysis Policy
  • La Verne IRB Translation Policy
  • La Verne IRB Turnaround Time
  • La Verne IRB Unengaged Investigators
  • La Verne IRB University-Wide Program Assessment or Quality Assurance Conduct Policy

University Policies and Procedures

  • Research Misconduct Policy (2011)
